ingredients.ingredient: 4 black tiger shrimp, peeled and deveined, tails off
Â½ fresh peach, pitted and cut into thirds

cookingTips: Thread shrimp and peach alternately on skewers for balanced cooking
Brush with BBQ sauce in final minute to prevent charring
Cook shrimp just until they turn opaque, about 1-2 minutes per side
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Teach the cook how to balance delicate shrimp with sweet peaches on the grill without overcooking either.
